name: Your Attention Please
description:
Made for the Extra Credits game jam! Try to find the bomb before time runs out.

Pick your mode at the start to pick how awesome you want your experience to be.

Use A and D to switch targets left and right, and SPACE when you think you have the right one. If you didn't get the right one press SPACE again to retry or click the menu button to select a mode.

All modes have the same goal, but they have unique restrictions!
